# GitHub Repository Topics

Use GitHub CLI to add these topics for better discoverability:

```bash
gh repo edit --add-topic aws
gh repo edit --add-topic aws-cli
gh repo edit --add-topic fuzzy-finder
gh repo edit --add-topic fzf
gh repo edit --add-topic lambda
gh repo edit --add-topic s3
gh repo edit --add-topic devops
gh repo edit --add-topic cloud
gh repo edit --add-topic aws-lambda
gh repo edit --add-topic aws-tools
gh repo edit --add-topic cli-tool
gh repo edit --add-topic developer-tools
gh repo edit --add-topic sqs
gh repo edit --add-topic dynamodb
gh repo edit --add-topic kinesis
gh repo edit --add-topic rds
gh repo edit --add-topic api-gateway
gh repo edit --add-topic cloud-infrastructure
gh repo edit --add-topic productivity
gh repo edit --add-topic python
```

Or add them all at once:

```bash
gh repo edit asayed18/awsf \
  --add-topic aws \
  --add-topic aws-cli \
  --add-topic fuzzy-finder \
  --add-topic fzf \
  --add-topic lambda \
  --add-topic s3 \
  --add-topic devops \
  --add-topic cloud \
  --add-topic aws-lambda \
  --add-topic aws-tools \
  --add-topic cli-tool \
  --add-topic developer-tools \
  --add-topic sqs \
  --add-topic dynamodb \
  --add-topic kinesis \
  --add-topic rds \
  --add-topic api-gateway \
  --add-topic cloud-infrastructure \
  --add-topic productivity \
  --add-topic python
```

## Repository Settings

### Description
Update the repository description to:
```
üîç Fast fuzzy search for AWS resources - Lambda, S3, SQS, DynamoDB, RDS, Kinesis & API Gateway. DevOps productivity tool powered by fzf.
```

### Website
Set the repository website/homepage to:
```
https://github.com/asayed18/awsf
```

### Social Preview
Upload a social preview image (1280x640px) showing the tool in action for better social media sharing.
